title: Ship

verbs: Place troops or weapons in battle formation
To cause to go on board a vessel or boat; to put on shipboard.
To engage to serve on board a vessel.
To ride as a passenger in a vehicle.
To traverse or travel by ship on a body of water.
Traverse or travel on (a body of water)
To be impelled or driven forward by the action of wind upon sails, as a ship on water; to be impelled on a body of water by steam or other power.
Change location; move, travel, or proceed, also metaphorically
To change (from one value to another).
To move or travel (from one location to another).
To change the location of an object.
To transfer a file from one location to another. After the file is transferred, there is only one copy of the file, in the new location.
To move an object one pixel at a time.
nouns: British transatlantic passenger liner
RMS Titanic, a cruise liner that sank on its maiden voyage on April 14, 1912 after colliding with an iceberg.

RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic Ocean on 15 April 1912 after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton, England to New York City. Titanic

RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the North Atlantic Ocean in the early morning of 15 April 1912 after colliding with an iceberg during her maiden voyage from Southampton, UK to New York City, US.
A ship is a large buoyant watercraft.
A larger water vessel
Large buoyant watercraft
Large water vessel.
A vessel that carries passengers or freight
A water-borne vessel generally larger than a boat.
Ships are large buoyant marine vessels.
A boat that by its size, solidity and power is appropriate for long navigations and big marine enterprises.
Titanic is a 1997 American epic romantic disaster film directed, written, co-produced, co-edited and partly financed by James Cameron.
1997 American romantic disaster film
A film by James Cameron
Titanic is a 1997 film released by Paramount Pictures and 20th Century Fox. (1997 film)
A facility consisting of the means and equipment necessary for the movement of passengers or goods
A means of conveyance.
Shared passenger transport service which is available for use by the general public
The act or the means of conveying people in mass as opposed to conveyance in private vehicles.
Any form of transport that can be used by a member of public (usually for a fee); as opposed to private ownership of e.g. cars.

Public transport is a shared passenger transport service which is available for use by the general public, as distinct from modes such as taxicab, carpooling or hired buses which are not shared by strangers without private arrangement.
The conveyance of people or goods from one place to another, especially on a public transportation system; the vehicles used for such conveyance.
The conveyance of people or goods from one place to another.
One who rides or travels in a vehicle, but who does not operate it and is not a member of the crew.
Person who travels in a vehicle without operating it
One who rides or travels in a vehicle.
A traveler riding in a vehicle (a boat or bus or car or plane or train etc) who is not operating it
A passenger is a person who travels in a vehicle but bears little or no responsibility for the tasks required for that vehicle to arrive at its destination or otherwise operate the vehicle.
A boat is a watercraft, usually smaller than most ships.
A watercraft designed to float or plane on, and provide transport over water.
A boat is a watercraft of any size designed to float or plane, to work or travel on water.
Watercraft
A small vessel for travel on water

description: A large ship, used for transport of people or cargo across the ocean. May be a cruise ship, commonly found around tropical locations.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's ship emoji features a majestic vessel with a sleek, modern design, rendered with exquisite 3D shading and realistic lighting that gives it a tangible quality. The smooth gradients and rounded edges on the hull and sails, a hallmark of Apple's visual style, create a sense of movement and adventure. On Apple devices, this emoji is ideal for conveying travel, voyages, or the start of an exciting journey, evoking a feeling of exploration and discovery.
